summary: Build an admin-management page for the app, restricted so only the user's Internet Identity principal can access it.
architectural_notes: Restrict admin-management page access via Internet Identity principal allowlist (self-only).

existing_features.title: Restrict access to the Admin Access management route (/admin/access) so it can only be viewed/used by the ownerâ€™s Internet Identity principal "zq4an-uqz34-isqap-u5moy-4rxll-vz3ff-ndqph-gvmn5-hqe6u-o6j3v-yqe" (self-only access), even if other principals are admins.

new_feature_requests.summary: Admin-management page that only the user's Internet Identity principal can access (self-only access control)

Enforce the same self-only access control on the backend admin-management APIs used by the Admin Access page (listAdmins, addAdmin, removeAdmin), allowing calls only when caller is the owner principal "zq4an-uqz34-isqap-u5moy-4rxll-vz3ff-ndqph-gvmn5-hqe6u-o6j3v-yqe".

projectName: Restrict Admin Access management page to a single owner principal
